Install SPLBee App on an instance that is accessible over internet or local network used by contestants 
 - This app contains: ```index=spl_bee```
 - Index contains results from contestants in order to score
 2. Install Lookup Editor in order to add or edit [splbee_questions.csv](/en-US/app/lookup_editor/lookup_edit?owner=nobody&namespace=spling_bee&lookup=splbee_questions.csv&type=csv)"},"type":"splunk.markdown"},"viz_LUKLXmXM":{"options":{"markdown":"## Moderator Tips:","fontColor":"#4785BA"},"type":"splunk.markdown"},"viz_FyYr6t65":{"options":{"markdown":"1. Open each dashboard on a new tab to easily flip between them
 - **[SPLing Bee](/en-US/app/timer-vis-app/start?dashboardid=spling_bee_content)**: Deliver questions to contestants
 - **[Scoreboard](/en-US/app/spling_bee/leaderboard)**: Displays the overall score
 2. Have fun!"},"type":"splunk.markdown"},"viz_OQMw5Yar":{"type":"splunk.image","options":{"preserveAspectRatio":true,"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://627ea3a28f19570db1744f13"}}}}
